summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6654 for the improvement of Northeast Windermere Road from 65th Avenue Northeast to Northeast 60th Street; by constructing a residental street Lighting System; under Ordinance No. 104454, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
